<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox Oak Item |name = Cell Battery |image = [[File:Bag_Cell_Battery_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Cell Battery''. |dex = 90 |effect = More Passive Mining Energy Regen }}
<!--T:2--> The '''Cell Battery''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount [[Underground|Mining Energy]] passively gained. The Cell Battery is unlocked after catching 90 unique Pok√©mon.
== Details == <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !!
